title: I did not expect that...
body: So I made myself a second account (my first is old and feel like making a new one with a new name) and almost reaching level 7. Almost every game there are mostly extremely toxic players which I did NOT expect that in my life. They're giving death threat, harassment, nasty attitude like mentally retarded and so on and on. I seriously DID NOT expect that to happen to be utterly disgusting and I have to report them...so many of them since they were being immensely toxic. It really BLEW MY MIND, I thought this is the beginner level for new players to play and learn before ranked or just play for fun, but no instead they're taking is very seriously. That's scary, man.

replies.body: Your account was probably quickly flagged as a smurf because you are much more skilled than a new player. That means you will mostly play with other smurfs. Most of the smurfs are new accounts of players that were banned for toxicity.
Oh wow, I did not know that. That's scary, man.

> Oh wow, I did not know that. That's scary, man.

It'll get better (as in, the same as your old account, which isn't great) as you level up more or your MMR increases so you actually play against level 30s. Low level games are pretty crazy. Everyone's smurfing and then there's the occasional innocent newb getting berated.
